        private void make_voting_button(javax.swing.JPanel voting_panel,
                      VotingStationAction action,
                      java.lang.Object lock)
        Create a button in the given panel.
        Parameters:
        voting_panel - The panel in which we want to add the button.
        action - The action pressing the button will activate.
        lock - The lock we need to notify when the button is pressed

      • make_voting_panel

        private void make_voting_panel(javax.swing.JPanel[] rows,
                     java.lang.Object lock)
        Make all the buttons for actions in the voting station.
        Parameters:
        rows - an array of panels, each represent a rows of buttons
        lock - The lock we need to notify when a button is pressed

      • chooseAction

        public void chooseAction()
        Wait for the user to choose an action. Show the choosing panel (the voting station main panel). After chooseAction, chosen_action will contain either the correct action or null if no action was chosen.

      • showVotingPanel

        private void showVotingPanel()
        Show the voting main panel.

      • make_input_panel

        private void make_input_panel(javax.swing.JPanel input_panel,
                    javax.swing.JTextField textField,
                    java.lang.Object lock,
                    Messages name)
        Make the panel for entering id/password.
        Parameters:
        input_panel - the panel we make.
        textField - where the text should be entered.
        lock - the lock we notify after the user finish.
        name - the message we want to show on the button (its name).
